page.title: 05SCHOOL DAYS
page.content: {NURSERY SCHOOL}90 pupils in Cockenzie,Port Seton or Longniddry attend Cockenzie Nursery. 30 attend for three mornings, 30 for two mornings and 30 for 4 afternoons. No pupils attend on Friday afternoons. The Headteacher does not think of Nursery as preparing for Primary but as helping little ones towards learning, to get on well together and to control their feelings. {PRIMARY SCHOOL}142 boys and 146 girls between 5 and 12 years are in 11 classes. There are 17 classrooms, a gym, craftroom, clubroom, assembly hall, dining area, stage, a large playing field and tarmac playing areas. It opened in 1965. {SECONDARY SCHOOL}Pupils transfer at about 12 to the Comprehensive Secondary School. They have free travel being more than 2 miles away.
